summary: Completed comprehensive testing of x67 Digital competition platform. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend mostly functional with excellent UI/UX design. Admin panel fully operational.

ui_bugs.issue: Clicking on competition cards in competitions page doesn't navigate to individual competition detail pages
ui_bugs.impact: Users cannot access individual competition details to purchase tickets directly from specific competitions

passed_tests: Homepage loads with featured competitions and hero section
Competitions page displays all competitions with filters
User registration form loads and functions
Admin login works with correct credentials (admin@x67digital.co.uk / admin123)
Admin dashboard shows comprehensive stats (Total Revenue: Â£4.99, Total Users: 2, Active Competitions: 6, etc.)
Admin can navigate between different admin sections (Overview, Competitions, Users, Orders)
Winners page displays previous winners properly
FAQ page displays with working accordion functionality
Navigation between all pages works correctly
All 19 backend API endpoints working (100% success rate)
Competition viewing and listing APIs work
Ticket purchase and order confirmation APIs work (with MOCKED Viva payments)
Admin stats and management APIs work
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix competition detail page navigation - competition cards should navigate to individual competition detail pages when clicked, allowing users to view full competition details and purchase tickets for specific competitions.
